item.description: I work at Long Hill reservation in Beverly, MA, but never get to hike the trail through the woods or enjoy the huge gardens behind the old house! Springtime is running 5 weeks ahead of schedule according to our on site horticulturist. The apple trees are covered with green buds, the forsythia and magnolia are blossoming, and the air smells like flowers. Join me to explore the gardens and 1.2 mile hiking trail on a spring afternoon! Those interested are invited to visit our property's turkeys and chickens afterwards :)

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Spring Blossoms, Short Hike, and Garden Tour at Long Hill Reservation
